definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
(slang) (Tw) to be checking out the hotties
pinyin: yan3 jing5 chi1 bing1 qi2 lin2

sentences.english: I think I need an ice-cream to chill out.
sentences.chinese: 我想吃支冰淇淋放松一下。

sentences.english: The taste of ice-cream would be like a blender mixing whip-cream evenly.
sentences.chinese: 吃冰淇淋的滋味就好像打果机把冰淇淋打得很均匀。

sentences.english: The taste of ice-cream would be like a blender mixing whip-cream evenly.
sentences.chinese: 吃冰淇淋的滋味就好像打果机把冰淇淋打得很均匀。

sentences.english: That's all the chocolate ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 就剩下这么点巧克力冰淇淋了。

sentences.english: Can you believe it, he even puts catchup on his ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 你相信吗，他甚至把调味酱放到冰淇淋里。

sentences.english: In the meantime, we're serving ice cream sundaes instead.
sentences.chinese: 所以这段时间我们改为提供圣代冰淇淋。

sentences.english: She put a dollop if ice-cream in each bowl.
sentences.chinese: 她在每个碗里放了一团冰淇淋。

sentences.english: They are serving chocolate ice-creams for the children to consume in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 他们给小孩子巧克力冰淇淋，让他们在厨房吃。

sentences.english: The little boy is licking the ice - cream cone .
sentences.chinese: 小男孩在舔着冰淇淋蛋卷。

sentences.english: Jo Leonard: “Who can resist the sound of the first ice-cream van of the season?”
sentences.chinese: 谁能经得住这个季节里第一辆冰淇淋车到来的诱惑？

sentences.english: People live aside usually go line up to buy its well-known juice ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 住在附近的人常常排长队购买它家有名的果汁冰淇淋。

sentences.english: Too much late-night ice cream can blow up your physique.
sentences.chinese: 太晚吃太多的冰淇淋会让你吹气似的长。

sentences.english: Indulge in the supreme treat of rich cream and morsels of macapuno.
sentences.chinese: 该冰淇淋让人沉醉于浓郁的奶香和点点椰肉间。

sentences.english: We often go swimming and eat a lot of ice-creams.
sentences.chinese: 我们经常去游泳和吃很多的冰淇淋。

sentences.english: Ice cream always makes his mouth  water.
sentences.chinese: 冰淇淋总能让他馋得淌口水。

sentences.english: A real winner since 1979, we combine Vanilla-flavored and Chocolate ice creams with a caramel ribbon.
sentences.chinese: 香草冰淇淋和巧克力冰淇淋加上焦糖丝。

definition: shaved or crushed ice dessert or beverage
